title: DBT – SEO Policy and Capability Adviser in Chief Scientific Adviser’s Office

content.text: The Department for Business and Trade (DBT) are recruiting for a new SEO Policy and Capability Adviser in the Chief Scientific Adviser (CSA) team. This role presents an exciting opportunity within the newly formed DBT, to work closely with the CSA and team leads to deliver the team’s policy advice and capability building functions. The CSA team’s portfolio is diverse, high-profile, and exciting, spanning many science and engineering subject areas across the department and government, and engaging with many internal and external stakeholders.

You will support delivery of the CSA’s policy advice and capability building workstreams, working on policy making, assurance, skills and capability. The successful candidate will have experience delivering across a range of projects and the ability to work with a wide range of stakeholders to build networks.
For more information, including the full job description and how to apply, please see Civil Service Jobs webpage here.
